sys_script_include.description: A function to process large amounts of records using a callback function. The function makes use of a specified date/time field to determine which record to process next. Multiple instances of a background script can run using this function to work on large amounts of records in a table without interfering with each other. For large tables it is imperative to add an index on the date time field! If the ghost parameter is set to true, records are updated with setWorkflow(false) to avoid business rules etc. being triggered.
sys_script_include.name: RecordBulkProcessor
